sharingCriteriaRules.description: Share all Work Orders with Delegated Admins with Public Read/Write which in conjunction with Permission Sets will determine the final permission each Delegated Admin User will have.
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Share WO w/ Delegated Admin

sharingCriteriaRules.description: Share all Work Orders with BO with Public Read/Write which in conjunction with Permission Sets will determine the final permission each BO persona will have.
sharingCriteriaRules.label: Share WO with BO
